description: As we all know - pictures can lie. When I saw the CV from today’s first applicant I thought he would be great-looking. But when he came in I noticed that the picture was obviously a bit old. To put it this way- he wasn't my type. And that’s why I didn't put much endeavor into convincing him. By the way: today’s interviews have been all about a bartender-job at a good hotel here in Prague. So on to the the next one. A young guy came in who appeared also not exactly the way I imagined him from his picture in his CV. But still he was somehow attractive to me. He dressed the way I suppose an applicant to dress and he had a nice hairstyle. But I was not sure about his sexual orientation. Was he maybe bisexual or even gay? I had to find out.
title: Dirty Scout 04
